entry.title: Thursday: Fog dissipating. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers near Boston Bar. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 19 January 2023
